## Query.urlResolver property

The urlResolver query returns the relative URL for a specified product, category or CMS page, using as input a url\_key appended by the url\_suffix, if one exists

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
urlResolver?: Maybe<EntityUrl>;
```
